overview: From 2025-05-24 to 2025-05-25, elizaos/eliza had 12 new PRs (14 merged), 2 new issues, and 7 active contributors.

topIssues.title: API /:agentId/rooms/:roomId is not working
topIssues.author: standujar
topIssues.body:
**Describe the bug**

the endpoint to get roomId informations is not working:

```
{
  "success": false,
  "error": {
    "message": "API endpoint not found",
    "code": 404
  }
}
```

**To Reproduce**

Create an agent, send a message to retrieve roomId from logs and use the API

http://localhost:3000/api/agents/:agentId/rooms/:roomId

**Expected behavior**

We should have information about the specific room ID

topIssues.title: API /:agentId/rooms is not working
topIssues.author: standujar
topIssues.body:
**Describe the bug**

The agents api /rooms return:

```
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "rooms": []
  }
}

```
**To Reproduce**

Run an agent, check the rooms API : http://localhost:3000/api/agents/:agentId/rooms

**Expected behavior**

We should have a list of existing registered rooms.

topPRs.title: feat: Comprehensive Image and Video Chat Support
topPRs.author: wtfsayo
topPRs.body:
# üé• Comprehensive Image and Video Chat Support

This PR implements complete image and video handling capabilities in the Eliza chat interface, allowing users to share media content that gets properly displayed and processed by AI models.

## ‚ú® Features Implemented

### üì∏ Media URL Detection & Display
- **Automatic URL parsing** for images and videos in chat messages
- **Platform embed support** for YouTube and Vimeo links
- **Clean media display** with proper image/video components
- **Error handling** with fallback options and external link buttons

### üìÅ File Upload Support
- **Enhanced file input** to accept both images and videos (`accept="image/*,video/*"`)
- **File preview** showing thumbnails for images and video previews
- **Upload API integration** with proper error handling
- **Clean display** - uploaded files show as media content, not file paths

### üîó API Integration
- **New upload endpoint**: `POST /api/agents/:agentId/upload-media`
- **Media attachments** properly formatted as `Media[]` type from @elizaos/core
- **AI model integration** - media URLs passed to models for processing
- **Type safety** with proper TypeScript interfaces

### üé® UI/UX Improvements
- **Updated tooltips** to reflect image/video support
- **Conditional rendering** for different media types
- **Loading states** and error handling for media content
- **Responsive design** with proper sizing constraints

## üõ†Ô∏è Technical Implementation

### New Components
- **`MediaContent`** - Main component for rendering media from text
- **`ImageContent`** - Dedicated image display with loading states
- **`VideoContent`** - Video player with embed support
- **`media-utils.ts`** - Utility functions for URL parsing and media detection

### Enhanced Components
- **Chat component** - File upload integration and media attachment handling
- **API client** - New `uploadMedia` method for file uploads
- **SocketIO manager** - Support for media attachments in messages

### Server Changes
- **Upload endpoint** - Handles image/video file uploads with validation
- **Media serving** - Files served at `/media/uploads/` endpoint
- **Type validation** - Proper MIME type checking for security

## üîí Security & Validation
- **File type validation** - Only allows approved image/video formats
- **Size limits** - Handled by multer configuration
- **MIME type checking** - Server-side validation of file types
- **Error handling** - Graceful fallbacks for failed uploads

## üì± Supported Formats

### Images
- JPG, JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP, SVG, BMP

### Videos
- MP4, WebM, MOV, AVI, MKV, QuickTime

### Platform Embeds
- YouTube (youtube.com, youtu.be)
- Vimeo (vimeo.com)

## üß™ Usage Examples

```bash
# Share an image URL
"Check out this image: https://example.com/image.jpg"

# Share a YouTube video
"Watch this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ"

# Upload files directly through the chat interface
# Click the attachment button and select image/video files
```

## ‚úÖ Testing Completed
- [x] Image URL detection and display
- [x] Video URL detection and display  
- [x] YouTube/Vimeo embed functionality
- [x] File upload with preview
- [x] Media attachment processing
- [x] Error handling for failed uploads
- [x] Clean display without file paths
- [x] AI model integration with media URLs
- [x] Type safety and proper interfaces

## üîÑ Backwards Compatibility
- ‚úÖ Existing chat functionality unchanged
- ‚úÖ Text-only messages work as before
- ‚úÖ Optional media features don't break existing flows
- ‚úÖ Graceful fallbacks for unsupported media

## üìã Files Modified
- `packages/client/src/components/chat.tsx` - Main chat component with upload logic
- `packages/client/src/lib/api.ts` - Added uploadMedia API function
- `packages/cli/src/server/api/agent.ts` - Added upload-media endpoint
- `packages/client/src/components/ui/chat/media-content.tsx` - New MediaContent component
- `packages/client/src/lib/media-utils.ts` - New media parsing utilities
- `packages/client/src/lib/socketio-manager.ts` - Media attachment support

## üéØ Benefits
- **Enhanced user experience** with rich media support
- **AI model capabilities** can now process visual content
- **Platform integration** with popular video services
- **Clean, intuitive interface** for media sharing
- **Robust error handling** and type safety
- **Scalable architecture** for future media features

This implementation provides a solid foundation for media-rich conversations while maintaining the clean, efficient design of the Eliza chat interface.

topPRs.title: feat: Enhanced Agent Components with Improved UI and Functionality
topPRs.author: wtfsayo
topPRs.body:
## Summary

This PR introduces significant enhancements to the agent-related components in the client package, improving both functionality and user experience.

## Key Changes

### Component Restructuring
- **Renamed and enhanced components** for better organization:
  - `action-viewer.tsx` ‚Üí `agent-action-viewer.tsx` (713 lines, enhanced functionality)
  - `log-viewer.tsx` ‚Üí `agent-log-viewer.tsx` (500 lines, improved UI)
  - `memory-viewer.tsx` ‚Üí `agent-memory-viewer.tsx`
  - `memory-edit-overlay.tsx` ‚Üí `agent-memory-edit-overlay.tsx`
  - `knowledge-manager.tsx` ‚Üí `agent-knowledge-manager.tsx`

### Enhanced Features
- **Improved Action Viewer**: Enhanced agent action viewing with better UI components and functionality
- **Better Log Management**: Upgraded log viewer with improved filtering, auto-scroll, and real-time updates
- **Consistent Naming**: All agent-related components now follow the `agent-*` naming convention
- **Updated Imports**: All component references updated throughout the codebase

### Technical Improvements
- Better component organization and modularity
- Enhanced TypeScript types and interfaces
- Improved error handling and loading states
- Better responsive design and user experience

## Files Changed
- 10 files modified
- +1,229 additions, -684 deletions
- Net addition of 545 lines of enhanced functionality

## Testing
- All existing functionality preserved
- Enhanced components maintain backward compatibility
- Improved user interface and experience

## Related
This builds upon previous memory UI enhancements and continues the effort to improve the ElizaOS client interface.

topPRs.title: chore: move logic for image description to bootstrap
topPRs.author: 0xbbjoker
topPRs.body:
<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

- **New Features**
  - Introduced automatic generation of detailed descriptions for image attachments, including a concise title, summary, and comprehensive description in a structured format.

- **Enhancements**
  - Attachments from recent messages are now merged more intelligently, avoiding duplicates and redacting details of older attachments for privacy.
  - Improved handling of different media types with a new classification system.

- **Bug Fixes**
  - Ensured that missing or incomplete attachment information is supplemented where possible.

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

topPRs.title: feat: üé® Memory UI Enhancements & UX Improvements
topPRs.author: wtfsayo
topPRs.body:
## üé® Memory UI Enhancements & UX Improvements

### Overview
This PR significantly improves the memory management interface with enhanced UI components, better user experience, and cleaner visual design across the memory viewer and edit overlay components.

### üöÄ Key Features Added

#### Memory Viewer Improvements
- **Enhanced Search Functionality**: Added a proper search input with search icon for filtering memories
- **Improved Date Grouping**: Redesigned date separators with horizontal lines and centered date labels
- **Better Loading States**: Added "Load More" button with loading indicator instead of infinite scroll
- **Cleaner Memory Cards**: Streamlined memory card design with better content organization
- **Responsive Layout**: Improved spacing and layout for better readability

#### Memory Edit Overlay Enhancements  
- **Simplified Content Display**: Reorganized memory content with cleaner sections
- **Thought Process Section**: Added dedicated section for AI thought processes with brain icon
- **Improved Metadata Handling**: Collapsible metadata section with better formatting
- **Enhanced Tag System**: Unified display for actions, providers, and sources as tags
- **Better Visual Hierarchy**: Improved spacing and typography throughout

### üîß Technical Improvements

#### UI/UX Changes
- Replaced badges with simpler span elements for counts and tags
- Added proper search input with icon from `lucide-react`
- Implemented horizontal separators for date grouping
- Enhanced loading states with spinner and descriptive text
- Improved responsive design and spacing consistency

#### Code Quality
- Better component organization and prop handling
- Improved accessibility with proper ARIA labels
- Cleaner CSS classes and consistent styling
- Enhanced error handling and loading states

### üìÅ Files Modified
- `packages/client/src/components/memory-viewer.tsx` - Main memory viewer component
- `packages/client/src/components/memory-edit-overlay.tsx` - Memory editing interface

### üéØ Benefits
- **Better User Experience**: More intuitive navigation and interaction
- **Improved Performance**: Optimized loading with pagination controls
- **Enhanced Readability**: Cleaner visual hierarchy and content organization
- **Mobile Friendly**: Better responsive design for various screen sizes

### üß™ Testing
- [x] Memory viewer displays correctly with new search functionality
- [x] Date grouping works properly with new separator design
- [x] Load more functionality works as expected
- [x] Memory edit overlay shows improved layout
- [x] All existing functionality preserved
- [x] Responsive design tested on multiple screen sizes

This update transforms the memory management interface into a more polished, user-friendly experience while maintaining all existing functionality.
